childElements.name: ReferencesInstructions
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock1", "text" : "

Some programs require that you submit letters of recommendation from one or more references. Provide the contact information for your references and we’ll send them instructions for submitting letters of recommendation.

", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }
